node.label: Input
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Output
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Display
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Display Touch
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
dots = {} temp = {} step = 1 tick = 5 stepcheck = false start = true grid = true
function onTick() if start then start = false clearScreen() end touchx = input.getNumber(3) touchy = input.getNumber(4) touch = input.getBool(1) step = step+1 if step == tick then step = 1 if stepcheck then stepDots() end end isPointInRectangle(touchx, touchy, 2, 40, 26, 7) if pressed then clearScreen() end if touch then isPointInRectangle(touchx, touchy, 2, 50, 17, 7) if pressed and not on1 then on1 = true stepcheck = not stepcheck end else on1 = false end if touch then isPointInRectangle(touchx, touchy, 2, 60, 22, 7) if pressed and not on2 and not stepcheck then on2 = true stepDots() end else on2 = false end if touch then isPointInRectangle(touchx, touchy, 2, 70, 22, 7) if pressed and not on3 and not stepcheck then on3 = true grid = not grid end else on3 = false end paint(touchx, touchy) end function onDraw() if grid then drawGrid() end drawDots() screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawText(2, 2, "Game") screen.drawText(2, 9, "Of") screen.drawText(2, 16, "Life") screen.setColor(25, 25, 25) screen.drawRectF(2, 40, 26, 7) screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawText(3, 41, "CLEAR") screen.setColor(25, 25, 25) screen.drawRectF(2, 50, 17, 7) screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) if stepcheck then screen.drawText(3, 51, "ON") else screen.drawText(3, 51, "OFF") end screen.setColor(25, 25, 25) screen.drawRectF(2, 60, 22, 7) screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawText(3, 61, "STEP") screen.setColor(25, 25, 25) screen.drawRectF(2, 70, 22, 7) screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawText(3, 71, "GRID") end
function drawGrid() for i1 = 1,43 do for i2 = 0,32 do screen.setColor(50, 50, 50) screen.drawLine(28+i1*3, 0, 28+i1*3, 96) screen.drawLine(31, i2*3, 160, i2*3) end end end
function drawDots() for i1 = 1,44 do for i2 = 1,33 do ii1 = i1+1 ii2 = i2+1 if dots[ii1][ii2] then getNeighbours(ii1, ii2) screen.setColor(0, 255, (nb*255)/8) drawDot(29+i1*3, i2*3-2) end end end end
function drawDot(x, y) screen.drawRectF(x, y, 2, 2) end
function stepDots() copytableDotsToTemp() for i1 = 2,44 do for i2 = 2,33 do getNeighbours(i1, i2) if nb<2 then temp[i1][i2] = false end if nb == 2 and dots[i1][i2] then temp[i1][i2] = true end if nb == 3 then temp[i1][i2] = true end if nb>3 then temp[i1][i2] = false end end end copytableTempToDots() end
function getNeighbours(x, y) nb = 0 x1 = x-1 y1 = y+1 if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end x1 = x y1 = y+1 if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end x1 = x+1 y1 = y+1 if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end x1 = x-1 y1 = y if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end x1 = x+1 y1 = y if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end x1 = x-1 y1 = y-1 if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end x1 = x y1 = y-1 if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end x1 = x+1 y1 = y-1 if dots[x1][y1] then nb = nb+1 end end
function copytableDotsToTemp() for i1 = 1,45 do for i2 = 1,34 do temp[i1][i2] = dots[i1][i2] end end end
function copytableTempToDots() for i1 = 1,45 do for i2 = 1,34 do dots[i1][i2] = temp[i1][i2] end end end
function paint(x, y) for i1 = 1,44 do for i2 = 1,33 do if touch and not last then isPointInRectangle(x+4, y+4, 29+i1*3, i2*3-2, 3, 3) if pressed then dots[i1][i2] = not dots[i1][i2] last = true end else if not touch then last = false end end end end end
function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) pressed = x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
function clearScreen() for i1 = 1,45 do if dots[i1] == nil then dots[i1] = {} end for i2 = 1,34 do dots[i1][i2] = false end end for i1 = 1,45 do if temp[i1] == nil then temp[i1] = {} end for i2 = 1,34 do temp[i1][i2] = false end end end

microprocessor_definition.name: Flappy Bird 2
microprocessor_definition.description: The classic game now on Stormworks Lua!

object.script:
--background block mv = false show = false p=0 c=0 a=0 b=0 reset=false function onTick() mv = input.getBool(32) show = input.getBool(31) reset=input.getBool(23) if reset then p=0 c=0 a=0 b=0 end if mv then if c > 2 then c=0 p=p+1 a=a+1 b=b+1 if p > 160 then p = 0 end if a > 200 then a = 0 end if b > 90 then b = 0 end else c = c + 1 end end end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() if show then screen.setColor(25,50,255) screen.drawRectF(0,0,w,2*(h/3)) screen.setColor(194,178,128) screen.drawRectF(0,(2*(h/3)),w,h/3) screen.setColor(50,255,30) if w < 65 then screen.drawRectF(0,2*(h/3)+1,w, 4) else screen.drawRectF(0,2*(h/3),w, 4) end
l=b/3 for t=-5,5 do screen.setColor(100,100,100) screen.drawCircleF(w-2-l+(t*30),21,3) screen.drawCircleF(w-8-l+(t*30),20,6) screen.drawCircleF(w-14-l+(t*30),21,3) end
screen.setColor(25,105,15) for i=-20,20 do screen.drawLine(w-1-p+(i*8),2*(h/3),w-4-p+(i*8),(2*(h/3))+4) screen.drawLine(w-2-p+(i*8),2*(h/3),w-5-p+(i*8),(2*(h/3))+4) screen.drawLine(w-3-p+(i*8),2*(h/3),w-6-p+(i*8),(2*(h/3))+4) screen.drawLine(w-4-p+(i*8),2*(h/3),w-7-p+(i*8),(2*(h/3))+4) end
k = a/2 for i=-10,10 do screen.setColor(25,30,35) screen.drawRectF(w-10-k+(i*50),2*(h/3),10,-15) screen.drawRectF(w-24-k+(i*50),2*(h/3),12,-26) screen.drawRectF(w-36-k+(i*50),2*(h/3),10,-15)
screen.setColor(80,80,80) screen.drawRectF(w-8-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-2,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-3-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-2,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-8-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-8,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-3-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-8,2,-4)
screen.drawRectF(w-22-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-2,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-15-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-2,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-22-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-8,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-15-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-8,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-22-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-20,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-15-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-20,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-22-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-14,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-15-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-14,2,-4)
screen.drawRectF(w-34-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-2,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-29-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-2,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-34-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-8,2,-4) screen.drawRectF(w-29-k+(i*50),2*(h/3)-8,2,-4) end end --screen.setColor(0,0,0) --screen.drawText(1,1,"p = " .. p) --screen.drawText(1,8,"a = " .. a) --screen.drawText(1,15,"b = " .. b) end

game=false rn=0 pipeScore=0 pb=false firstRun=true mvp=false dd=false mb=false mbb=false f=0 hs=0 savedata=false bs=false t=5 function onTick() if f < 10 then f=f+1 end isPressed = input.getBool(1) pipeScore=input.getNumber(13) hs=input.getNumber(14) pb=input.getBool(24) bs=input.getBool(21) if game then output.setBool(32,mb)--mv bkg output.setBool(31,true)--show bkg output.setBool(30,mvp)--move pipes output.setBool(29,true)--draw pipes output.setBool(28,mbb) output.setBool(27,true) else output.setBool(32,false)--mv bkg output.setBool(31,true)--show bkg output.setBool(30,false)--move pipes output.setBool(29,false)--draw pipes output.setBool(28,false) output.setBool(27,false) end output.setNumber(8,input.getNumber(8)) output.setBool(25, isPressed) rn = input.getNumber(8) output.setNumber(8,rn) output.setNumber(11,input.getNumber(11)) if isPressed and firstRun then game = true firstRun = false mvp=true mb=true mbb=true end if pb and f > 9 then dd=true end
if dd then--dead mvp=false mb=false mbb=false if pipeScore > hs then savedata = true end if t > -1 then t = t - 1 end end
if dd and isPressed and t < 0 then savedata=false dd=false output.setBool(23,true) mvp=true mb=true mbb=true f=0 pb=false pipeScore=0 t=5 else output.setBool(23,false) end output.setBool(22,savedata) output.setNumber(14,pipeScore) end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() if not game or dd then if bs then screen.setColor(255,255,255) screen.drawText((w/2)-32,(h/2)-24,"touch to start") end end if dd then screen.setColor(150,150,150) screen.drawRectF((w/2)-28,(h/2)-15,56,30) screen.setColor(200,0,0) screen.drawText((w/2)-26,(h/2)-13,"game over") screen.setColor(0,0,0) screen.drawText((w/2)-26,(h/2)-7,"your score:") screen.drawText((w/2)-26,(h/2)+1,math.floor(pipeScore)) if pipeScore > hs or savedata then if bs then screen.setColor(255,0,255) screen.drawText((w/2)-26,(h/2)+9,"high score") end end end screen.setColor(255,255,255) screen.drawText(2,2,"Score: " .. math.floor(pipeScore)) screen.drawText(2,9,"HI SCORE: " .. math.floor(hs)) if pb then --screen.drawText(2,9,"boop=true") else --screen.drawText(2,9,"boop=false") end end

--bird drawing block mv=false sh=false dx = 20 dy = 0 a=0 c=0 l=0 ct = 10 jump=false jp=false ff=false b=0 reset=false function onTick() reset = input.getBool(23) mv = input.getBool(28) sh = input.getBool(27) jump = input.getBool(25) if reset then dx = 20 dy = 0 a=0 c=0 l=0 ct = 10 jump=false jp=false ff=false b=0 end if jump then jp = true b=0 ct=10 end if mv then if c>2 then c=0 if not jp and b < 3 then a=a+1 b=b+1 elseif not jp and b >= 3 then a=a+2 b=b+1 else ct=ct-1 if ct > 6 then a=a-3 elseif ct > 3 then a=a-2 else a=a-1 end if ct == 0 then jp = false ct = 10 end end else c=c+1 end end output.setNumber(11, dy+a) end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() dy = h/2
db(dx,dy + a) end
function sl(x1,y1,x2,y2) screen.drawLine(x1,y1,x2,y2) end
function db(px,py) screen.setColor(255,255,255) sl(px+8,py+1,px+8,py+4) sl(px+9,py+1,px+9,py+4) sl(px+10,py+2,px+10,py+4) sl(px+1,py+4,px+4,py+4) sl(px+1,py+5,px+4,py+5) screen.setColor(0,0,0) sl(px+7,py,px+8,py) sl(px+8,py,px+9,py) sl(px+9,py,px+10,py) sl(px+4,py+1,px+5,py+1) sl(px+5,py+1,px+6,py+1) sl(px+6,py+1,px+7,py+1) sl(px+7,py+1,px+8,py+1) sl(px+10,py+1,px+11,py+1) sl(px+3,py+2,px+5,py+2) sl(px+7,py+2,px+8,py+2) sl(px+11,py+2,px+12,py+2) sl(px+9,py+2,px+10,py+2) sl(px+1,py+3,px+4,py+3) sl(px+7,py+3,px+8,py+3) sl(px+11,py+3,px+12,py+3) sl(px+0,py+4,px+0,py+7) sl(px+4,py+4,px+6,py+4) sl(px+8,py+4,px+14,py+4) sl(px+5,py+5,px+6,py+5) sl(px+9,py+5,px+9,py+9) sl(px+13,py+5,px+13,py+8) sl(px+4,py+6,px+6,py+6) sl(px+11,py+6,px+14,py+6) sl(px+1,py+7,px+5,py+7) sl(px+2,py+8,px+3,py+8) sl(px+10,py+8,px+13,py+8) sl(px+3,py+9,px+9,py+9) screen.setColor(225,20,20) sl(px+10,py+5,px+13,py+5) sl(px+10,py+6,px+11,py+6) sl(px+10,py+7,px+13,py+7) screen.setColor(255,255,0) sl(px+5,py+2,px+7,py+2) sl(px+4,py+3,px+7,py+3) sl(px+6,py+4,px+8,py+4) sl(px+6,py+5,px+9,py+5) sl(px+4,py+5,px+5,py+5) sl(px+1,py+6,px+4,py+6) sl(px+6,py+6,px+9,py+6) screen.setColor(150,75,0) sl(px+5,py+7,px+9,py+7) sl(px+3,py+8,px+9,py+8) end

--pipe drawing block p1loc=0 p2loc=0 p1h=0 p2h=0 p3h=0 mv=false sh=false c=0 a=0 b=-50 d=-100 w=0 rn=0 boop=false bh=0 h=0 inPipe=false pts=-1 a2s=false reset=false function onTick() mv = input.getBool(30) sh = input.getBool(29) rn=input.getNumber(8) bh=input.getNumber(11) reset=input.getBool(23) if reset then p1loc=0 p2loc=0 p1h=0 p2h=0 p3h=0 mv=false sh=false c=0 a=0 b=-50 d=-100 w=0 rn=0 boop=false bh=0 h=0 inPipe=false pts=-1 a2s=false end if mv then if c > 2 then c=0 a=a+1 b=b+1 d=d+1 else c=c+1 end if a > 160 then a=0 p1h=(rn*8) end if b > 160 then b=0 p2h=(rn*8) end if d > 160 then d=0 p3h=(rn*8) end end g1=w+(a*-1) > 32 and w+(a*-1) < 51 g2=w+(b*-1) > 32 and w+(b*-1) < 51 g3=w+(d*-1) > 32 and w+(d*-1) < 51 t1=(bh < (2*(h/3))-40+p1h or bh+7 > (2*(h/3))+p1h) t2=(bh < (2*(h/3))-40+p2h or bh+7 > (2*(h/3))+p2h) t3=(bh < (2*(h/3))-40+p3h or bh+7 > (2*(h/3))+p3h) if g1 and t1 then boop=true elseif g2 and t2 then boop=true elseif g3 and t3 then boop=true else boop=false end
if (g1 or g2 or g3) and not a2s then a2s=true end if not g1 and not g2 and not g3 and a2s then a2s=false pts=pts+1 end output.setBool(24,boop) output.setNumber(13,pts) end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight()
if sh then dp(a*-1, p1h) dp((b*-1), p2h) dp((d*-1), p3h) end --screen.drawText(1,1,"pp " .. w+(a*-1)) --screen.drawText(1,8,"rn" .. rn) end
function dp(x,y) screen.setColor(20,200,20) screen.drawRectF(w-20+x,(2*(h/3))+y,10,60) screen.drawRectF(w-21+x,(2*(h/3))+y,12,6) screen.setColor(70,255,70) dl(w-21+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-21+x,(2*(h/3))+6+y) dl(w-20+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-20+x,h) screen.setColor(40,250,40) dl(w-19+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-19+x,h) dl(w-18+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-18+x,h) dl(w-16+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-16+x,h) screen.setColor(15,170,15) dl(w-14+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-14+x,h) screen.setColor(10,150,10) dl(w-12+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-12+x,h) dl(w-11+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-11+x,h) dl(w-10+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-10+x,(2*(h/3))+6+y) screen.setColor(0,0,0) dl(w-10+x,(2*(h/3))+y+6,w-10+x,h) dl(w-21+x,(2*(h/3))+y+6,w-21+x,h) dl(w-9+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-9+x,(2*(h/3))+7+y) dl(w-22+x,(2*(h/3))+y,w-22+x,(2*(h/3))+7+y) dl(w-22+x,(2*(h/3))-1+y,w-8+x,(2*(h/3))-1+y) dl(w-22+x,(2*(h/3))+6+y,w-8+x,(2*(h/3))+6+y)
screen.setColor(20,200,20) screen.drawRectF(w-20+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y, 10, -60) screen.drawRectF(w-21+x,(2*(h/3))-39+y, 12, -6) screen.setColor(70,255,70) dl(w-21+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-21+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y) dl(w-20+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-20+x,-1) screen.setColor(40,250,40) dl(w-19+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-19+x,-1) dl(w-18+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-18+x,-1) dl(w-16+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-16+x,-1) screen.setColor(15,170,15) dl(w-14+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-14+x,-1) screen.setColor(10,150,10) dl(w-12+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-12+x,-1) dl(w-11+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-11+x,-1) dl(w-10+x,(2*(h/3))-40+y,w-10+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y) screen.setColor(0,0,0) dl(w-22+x,(2*(h/3))-39+y,w-8+x,(2*(h/3))-39+y) dl(w-22+x,(2*(h/3))-39+y,w-22+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y) dl(w-9+x,(2*(h/3))-39+y,w-9+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y) dl(w-22+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y,w-8+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y) dl(w-21+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y,w-21+x,-1) dl(w-10+x,(2*(h/3))-46+y,w-10+x,-1) end
function dl(x1,y1,x2,y2) screen.drawLine(x1,y1,x2,y2) end
